ygData.subject: Advice on Words of Darkness Quest
ygData.msgSnippet: Good Evening (well for me at least) My Dark Brethren, I have decided I want to do the quest for the Words of Darkness.  I was wondering; 1) Do I have to begin
ygData.messageBody:
Good Evening (well for me at least) My Dark Brethren,
 
I have decided I want to do the quest for the Words of Darkness.  I was wondering; 1) Do I have to begin (by hailing Vurgo) the quest before I camp the Shadowmen for the Book of Shadow? and 2) Where is the best place to camp the shadowmen for this specific drop?
 
I know it is a rare drop and I have heard that if it is going to drop you will see it in the hands of the MOB but, I was camping shdaowmen this evening prior to beginning the quest and we killed 10 or 12 that had what appeared to be a book in their hands, yet when the MOB died the book disappeared and was not on the corpse.
 
Any help would be appreciated.
 
Kelvanan Ixtaz
27 Necromancer
Kindred Companions
Prexus
